verses.verse: "For <S%G1063><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> who was the master <S%G3617><s%> of a household, <S%G3748><s%> who went out <S%G1831><s%> early <S%G260><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%> to hire <S%G3409><s%> laborers <S%G2040><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> he had agreed <S%G4856><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the laborers <S%G2040><s%> for <S%G1537><s%> a denarius <S%G1220><s%> a day, <S%G2250><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the marketplace. <S%G58><s%>

To <S%G2548><s%> them <S%G2036><s%> he said, <S%G5210><s%> 'You also <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G5600><s%> right <S%G1342><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>' So <S%G1161><s%> they went their way. <S%G565><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> he went out <S%G1831><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> sixth <S%G1623><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> likewise. <S%G5615><s%>

About <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> he went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> idle. <S%G692><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Why do you <S%G2476><s%> stand here <S%G5602><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> idle? <S%G692><s%>'

When <S%G1096><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G2012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> manager, <S%G2012><s%> <S%G2564><s%> 'Call the laborers <S%G2040><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pay <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G846><s%> their wages, <S%G3408><s%> beginning <S%G756><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the first. <S%G4413><s%>'

"When <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were hired at about <S%G4012><s%> the <S%G5610><s%> eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> they each <S%G303><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a denarius. <S%G1220><s%>

When <S%G2064><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> they supposed <S%G3543><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they would receive <S%G2983><s%> more; <S%G4119><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> each <S%G303><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> a denarius. <S%G1220><s%>
When <S%G1161><s%> they received <S%G2983><s%> it, <S%G1111><s%> they murmured against <S%G2596><s%> the master of the household, <S%G3617><s%>

saying, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3778><s%> 'These last <S%G2078><s%> have spent <S%G4160><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you have made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> equal <S%G2470><s%> to us, <S%G2254><s%> who have borne <S%G941><s%> the burden <S%G922><s%> of the day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scorching heat! <S%G2742><s%>'

"But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2083><s%> 'Friend, I am doing <S%G91><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wrong. <S%G91><s%> Didn't <S%G3780><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> agree <S%G4856><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> for a denarius? <S%G1220><s%>

Take <S%G142><s%> that which is yours, <S%G4674><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> go your way. <S%G5217><s%> It is my desire <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G1161><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G2078><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> just <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> much as to you. <S%G4671><s%>

Isn't <S%G3756><s%> it <S%G1832><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I want <S%G2309><s%> to with <S%G1722><s%> what I own? <S%G1487><s%> Or is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> good? <S%G18><s%>'

So <S%G3779><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> last. <S%G2078><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> called, <S%G2822><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> few <S%G3641><s%> are chosen. <S%G1588><s%>"

As Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was going up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> he took <S%G3880><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> aside, <S%G2532><s%> and on the way <S%G3598><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%>

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we are going up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they will condemn <S%G2632><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> will hand <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> over to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> mock, <S%G1702><s%> to <S%G2532><s%> scourge, <S%G3146><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to crucify; <S%G4717><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he will be raised up. <S%G450><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of <S%G5207><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sons, <S%G5207><s%> kneeling <S%G4352><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> asking <S%G154><s%> a certain thing <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

He said <S%G2036><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2309><s%> want? <S%G3004><s%>" She said to him, <S%G846><s%> "Command that <S%G2443><s%> these, <S%G3778><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons, <S%G5207><s%> may sit, <S%G2523><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> right hand, <S%G1188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> left <S%G2176><s%> hand, <S%G1188><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> Kingdom. <S%G932><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "You don't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you are asking. <S%G154><s%> Are you able <S%G1410><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G3195><s%> about to drink, <S%G4095><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am baptized with? <S%G907><s%>" They said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "We are able. <S%G1410><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "You will indeed <S%G3303><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> cup, <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am baptized with, <S%G907><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> to sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand <S%G1188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> left <S%G2176><s%> hand is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> to give; <S%G1325><s%> but <S%G235><s%> it is for whom <S%G3739><s%> it has been prepared <S%G2090><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>"
When <S%G191><s%> the ten <S%G1176><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G23><s%> they were indignant with <S%G4012><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> summoned <S%G4341><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> "You know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the rulers <S%G758><s%> of the nations <S%G1484><s%> lord it over <S%G2634><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their great <S%G3173><s%> ones exercise authority over <S%G2715><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

It shall <S%G2071><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> but <S%G235><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> desires to become <S%G2309><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> shall be <S%G2309><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> servant. <S%G1249><s%>
Whoever <S%G3739><s%> desires <S%G2309><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> shall be <S%G1511><s%> your <S%G5213><s%> bondservant, <S%G1401><s%>

even as <S%G5618><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to be served, <S%G1247><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to serve, <S%G1247><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> his <S%G846><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> as a ransom <S%G3083><s%> for <S%G473><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>"

As <S%G1607><s%> they <S%G846><s%> went <S%G1607><s%> out <S%G1607><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jericho, <S%G2410><s%> a <S%G3793><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> blind men <S%G5185><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the road, <S%G3598><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was passing by, <S%G3855><s%> cried out, <S%G2896><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> have mercy on <S%G1653><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> you son <S%G5207><s%> of David! <S%G1138><s%>"

The <S%G1161><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> telling them <S%G2443><s%> that they should be quiet, <S%G4623><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> they cried <S%G2896><s%> out even more, <S%G3185><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> have mercy on <S%G1653><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> you son <S%G5207><s%> of David! <S%G1138><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood still, <S%G2476><s%> and called <S%G5455><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> asked, <S%G2036><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2309><s%> want me to do <S%G4160><s%> for you? <S%G2309><s%>"
They told <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> may be opened. <S%G455><s%>"

Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> being moved with compassion, <S%G4697><s%> touched <S%G680><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes; <S%G3788><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> received their <S%G846><s%> sight, <S%G308><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
